GAMEPLAY_PlantNutrientsDescription.English: An assorted mix of organic waste used as fertilizer.
GAMEPLAY_PlantNutrientsDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una variedad de residuos orgánicos utilizados como fertilizante.

GAMEPLAY_PlantNutrientsCraftedDescriptio.English: Shredded birch bark that can be used as fertilizer.
GAMEPLAY_PlantNutrientsCraftedDescriptio.Spanish (Spain): Corteza de abedul molida que puede ser utilizada como fertilizante.

GAMEPLAY_PlantWaterDescription.English: Distilled water, supposedly 'just like' rain water. Honestly? That sounds like a scam.
GAMEPLAY_PlantWaterDescription.Spanish (Spain): Agua destilada, supuestamente 'exactamente' como el agua de lluvia. Honestamente, suena a estafa.

GAMEPLAY_DistilledWaterDescription.Spanish (Spain): Agua destilada, perfecta para el uso en jardinería.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterSmallDescription.English: A recycled can, full of dirt and nutrients. Ready to be used as a planter.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterSmallDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una lata reciclada, llena de tierra y nutrientes. Lista para ser usada como maceta.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterBigDescription.English: A cooking pot, full of dirt and nutrients. Ready to be used as a planter.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterBigDescription.Spanish (Spain): Una cazuela, llena de tierra y nutrientes. Lista para ser usada como maceta.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipSmall2Description.English: A rose hip sapling, planted in a recycled can.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipSmall2Description.Spanish (Spain): Un retoño de escaramujo, plantado en una lata.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipSmall1Description.English: A rose hip sapling, planted in a recycled can. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipSmall1Description.Spanish (Spain): Un retoño de escaramujo, plantado en una lata. Completamente crecido.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipBig2Description.English: A rose hip sapling, planted in a cooking pot.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipBig2Description.Spanish (Spain): Un retoño de escaramujo, plantado en una cazuela.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipBig1Description.English: A rose hip sapling, planted in a cooking pot. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterRosehipBig1Description.Spanish (Spain): Un retoño de escaramujo, plantado en una cazuela. Completamente crecido.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterReishiBig2Description.English: Reishi spores, planted in a cooking pot.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterReishiBig2Description.Spanish (Spain): Esporas de Reishi, plantadas en una cazuela.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterReishiBig1Description.English: Reishi spores, planted in a cooking pot. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterReishiBig1Description.Spanish (Spain): Esporas de Reishi, plantadas en una cazuela. Completamente crecidas.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterOldmanBig2Description.English: Lichen sorediums, planted in a cooking pot.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterOldmanBig2Description.Spanish (Spain): Soredios de liquen, plantados en una cazuela.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterOldmanBig1Description.English: Lichen sorediums, planted in a cooking pot. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterOldmanBig1Description.Spanish (Spain): Soredios de liquen, plantados en una cazuela. Completamente crecidos.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailSmall2Description.English: A cat tail head, planted in a recycled can.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailSmall2Description.Spanish (Spain): Un cogollo de espadaña, plantado en una lata.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailSmall1Description.English: A cat tail head, planted in a recycled can. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailSmall1Description.Spanish (Spain): Un cogollo de espadaña, plantad0 en una lata. Completamente crecido.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailBig2Description.English: A cat tail head, planted in a cooking pot.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailBig2Description.Spanish (Spain): Un cogollo de espadaña, plantado en una cazuela.

GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailBig1Description.English: A cat tail head, planted in a cooking pot. Fully grown.
GAMEPLAY_PlanterCattailBig1Description.Spanish (Spain): Un cogollo de espadaña, plantado en una cazuela. Completamente crecido.
